tweet: A big thank you to @BobbyScott Chairman of the @EdLaborCmte for his leadership to strengthen public education, invest in school infrastructure, & help uplift communities nationwide. Looking forward to working together to #RebuildAmericasSchools.

GOP passed a nearly $2 Trillion #TrumpTax bill that overwhelmingly benefited corporations & ultra-wealthy. Investing $100 Billion in upgrading America's schools could pay more effective economic dividends for the country & help create 1.9 million jobs. #RebuildAmericasSchools pic.twitter.com/5cyLN2QTYU

Good schools expand opportunities for students & help create a healthier, more vibrant community & economy for all. But currently, funding for public school buildings falls $46 Billion short. Federal gov't should step up & Congress should pass the #RebuildAmericasSchools Act. pic.twitter.com/oeozHD9tQT

Americans deserve #equalpay for equal work. Proud to help introduce the Paycheck Fairness Act today to bridge the gender pay gap, prevent pay discrimination, & advance equality for women in the workplace. #PayCheckFairness will strengthen our economy & working families everywhere

Health & wellness are crucial to student success and #schoolnurses do so much to help promote healthy schools. Thanks to @schoolnurses RI chapter’s Amy Dark of Fogarty Memorial School for her advocacy on behalf of students & families. pic.twitter.com/JG0Wn4fSxZ

Another cold snap is set to hit this week, with temperatures expected to plunge on Wednesday night. Please take precautions. Warming centers are available around RI for any residents needing warmth & shelter from extreme cold:  http://www.riema.ri.gov/warmingcenters/

Clean, safe drinking water is sometimes taken for granted when we turn on the tap. Honored to receive @RIKidsCount Young Children’s Champion Award. #Medicare's #PartD program paid $32.5 BILLION for top 50 prescription drugs.
 
If @CMSGov was able to negotiate w/ drug makers the way @DeptVetAffairs does & paid same prices, then U.S. would have saved $14.5 BILLION.

Trump admin must get on board with bills to cut Rx costs!

74 years after the liberation of Auschwitz, we commemorate #HolocaustRemembranceDay. We honor victims & survivors & resolve to combat hatred, prejudice, anti-Semitism & religious intolerance. To #NeverAgain be indifferent to the suffering & oppression of others. #WeRemember

The #TrumpShutdown is finally ending. It should never have happened in the first place. This is a recognition by Pres Trump that his forced shutdown is hurting America & is the wrong way to try to change policy.

Today, I voted to end the #TrumpShutdown & pay federal workers like #BorderPatrol. But GOP leaders blocked a bipartisan effort to reopen gov’t. Still, fact that Dem plan to reopen gov’t without Trump’s wall funding earned more votes than Trump’s plan sent a clear message to all. pic.twitter.com/acpegh7ye2

Dr. King helped open doors of opportunity for countless people from all walks of life. Proud to join @RI_CNCS & local volunteers from @AmeriCorpsRI @SeniorCorps & Federal Hill House in #PVD for service projects to make our schools & communities more welcoming for all! #MLKDay

“Make a career of humanity. Commit yourself to the noble struggle for equal rights. You will make a greater person of yourself, a greater nation of your country and a finer world to live in.” Dr. Kings's words ring true for a new generation. This #MLKDay, let us join together to remember Dr. King’s words & deeds.
Let us strive to follow his example of courage, faith, persistence, & love.
Let us continue marching along the path he blazed toward justice, equality, inclusiveness & peace. #MLKDay2019 pic.twitter.com/3wozzKwiAc

Pres Trump doesn’t seem to understand that Republicans control the Senate & set the voting agenda. All he has to do is ask Majority Leader McConnell to call a vote & the full Senate could pass a bipartisan bill tomorrow to end the #TrumpShutdown. https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/1084121557193146368?s=21 …

The Senate could quickly end the #TrumpShutdown If Senate Republicans simply allow an up or down vote on re-opening the gov’t. A clean CR could pass with strong bipartisan support. Pres Trump should stop pouting & encourage his party to vote instead of just shutting down gov’t.

Democrats support smart #bordersecurity & a whole of gov’t approach to public safety. Trump’s demand for ‘wall or nothing’ is making our country less safe & wasting billions. Republicans should put protecting Americans above protecting Trump and allow Congress to vote.

The #TrumpShutdown by the #s:
 
$5.7B - amount Trump just decided he wants as a down-payment for his wall.
 
$3.6B - amount shutdown has already wasted.
 
$0.00 - amount Trump paid 800,000+ workers hit by his shutdown.
 
0 - votes Senate GOP has allowed on bills to reopen gov't.

Today is a payday without pay for thousands of federal employees in RI who’ve been on the job, but aren’t getting a paycheck because of the #TrumpShutdown. That’s unfair for workers & will have a negative ripple effect throughout our communities & the economy. pic.twitter.com/wCk2McbRcQ

Senate Dems just asked to bring up a bill reopening government, but Majority Leader McConnell (R-KY) objected. The #TrumpShutdown will go on as long as Senate Republicans support it. Senate should do it’s job & take a vote to reopen gov't for the American people.

Democrats want to reopen the government.
President Trump opposes reopening the government.

Congratulations to @SpeakerPelosi for regaining the Speaker’s gavel! I know she will wield it wisely, lead the House effectively, & always put the best interests of the American people first. #SpeakerPelosi #MadameSpeaker

Congrats to @SenWhitehouse @JimLangevin @RepCicilline on being sworn in for new terms as members of the #116thCongress. Together, we will work to reopen gov’t, better serve RIers, & restore stronger oversight & accountability.

Tonight, the full U.S. Senate voted to confirm Aaron L. Weisman to lead the U.S. Attorney’s office for RI. Mr. Weisman has the experience to effectively serve in this critical post. I am confident that he will provide strong, steady, long-term leadership.

The Trump government shutdown is a reckless political stunt that is not making our country safer, it’s just wasting money. Pres Trump is wrong if he thinks shuttering DHS, DOJ & other critical agencies for 2 weeks somehow improves border security. #TrumpShutdown
